mapper.select: select m.mail_num, m.mail_check, m.mail_sender, m.mail_receiver, e.emp_name, mail_title, mail_content, mail_Date from mail m inner join employee e on m.mail_receiver = e.emp_num where mail_sender = #{param1} and mail_check = 0 union select m.mail_num, m.mail_check, m.mail_sender, m.mail_receiver, e.emp_name, mail_title, mail_content, mail_Date from mail m inner join employee e on m.mail_sender = e.emp_num where mail_receiver = #{param1} and mail_check = 0 order by mail_num desc limit #{param2}, #{param3};
